thread.title: Kanche is certified U/A
thread.title_full: Kanche is certified U/A - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Kanche is certified U/A
text:
Director Krish Jagarlamudi's Kanche starring Varun Tej and Pragya Jaiswal in the lead roles has been certified U/A.
It is learnt that censor formalities of the film have been completed and the censor board was impressed with it content and production values.
Rajeev Reddy of First Frame Entertainments has produced the film, a periodical based during the World War 2. With music by Chirantan Bhatt, the film which also stars Nikitin Dheer in an important role, is gearing up for release in November.
